meanings.definition: An area of lightest value in a painting or other artwork.
meanings.sent1: The artist used a bright highlight to make the flower stand out.
meanings.sent2: The highlight on the edge of the canvas drew attention to the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The highlight on the painting winked mischievously at the viewers.
meanings.sent4: The highlight in the artwork was like a beacon in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The highlight in the painting shone like a tiny star in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: She would highlight the key points in her presentation to make them memorable.
meanings.sent2: The speaker would highlight the importance of teamwork in achieving success.
meanings.sent3: He would highlight his friend's funny dance moves to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight would highlight the beauty of the garden after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The spotlight would highlight the lead singer on stage during the concert.

meanings.definition: A particularly significant or interesting part of an event or period.
meanings.sent1: The highlight of the party was the surprise guest who arrived.
meanings.sent2: The highlight of the trip was seeing the majestic waterfall up close.
meanings.sent3: The highlight of the movie was the hilarious blooper reel at the end.
meanings.sent4: The highlight of the book club meeting was the passionate discussion about the characters.
meanings.sent5: The highlight of the festival was the fireworks display that lit up the night sky.
